requirements.text: The admin must be able to add a course to the platform
requirements.description: The admin must be able to add the course title, the category it belongs to, the difficulty level and the material (files, quizes) related to it.

requirements.text: The admin must be able to collect statistics regarding the progress of the courses
requirements.description: The admin must be able to track course progress through key statistics like completion rates, scores and engagement

requirements.text: The user must be able to search for a course
requirements.description: The user must be able to search for a course through its category or title

requirements.text: The user must be able to enroll in a course
requirements.description: The user must be able to enroll in a course

requirements.text: The user must be able to participate in quizzes in each course
requirements.description: The user must be able to participate in quizzes in each course to check their knowlegde and progress

requirements.text: The user must be able to earn points from quizes
requirements.description: The user must be able to earn points from quizes based on performance

requirements.text: The user must be able to appear on a leaderboard based on points
requirements.description: The user must be able to rank on a leaderboard based on earned points

requirements.text: The user must be able to visit their profile
requirements.description: The user must be able to visit their profile. The profile is the page with user's courses, progress and relevant information

requirements.text: The user must be able to receive certifications of completion
requirements.description: The user must be able to receive certifications of completion in each course indicating their level of proficiency in the subject

requirements.text: The user must be able to download material in each course
requirements.description: The user must be able to download material in each course. Material can be files and videos.

requirements.text: The user must be able to rate a course
requirements.description: The user must be able to rate a course with 1-5 stars

requirements.text: The user must be able to participate in forums in each course
requirements.description: The user must be able to participate in forums in each course

requirements.text: The user must be able to become a premium user
requirements.description: The user must be able to become a premium user

requirements.text: The user must be able to receive recommendations for courses based on their learning history
requirements.description: The user must be able to receive recommendations for courses based on their learning history

requirements.text: The premium user must be able to have access to exclusive courses
requirements.description: The premium user must be able to have access to exclusive courses

requirements.text: The system must be able to load the pages in under 1 second
The system must be able to encrypt and protect user data
requirements.description: Secure authentication, access controls, and regular security audits should be enforced to maintain data protection

requirements.text: The system must be able to support at least 5000 users simultaneously
The platform must be able to operate in different operating systems, mobile and desktop
requirements.description: The platform must be compatible with different operating systems such as Linux , Windows and MacOS for desktops, as well as Android and iOS for mobile

requirements.text: The system must be able to support integration with third party services
requirements.description: The system must be able to integrate with third party services that include transactions

requirements.text: The system must be able to support and secure different kinds of payments
requirements.description: The system must be able to support and secure different kinds of payments such as credit card, paypal , Google Pay or Apple Pay

requirements.text: The admin must be able to remove a course from the platform
requirements.description: The admin must be able to remove courses from the platform

requirements.text: The admin must be able to edit a course
requirements.description: The admin must be able to edit a course and especially its title, category  and the material (files, quizes) related to it.

requirements.text: The user must be able to withdraw from a course
requirements.description: The user must be able to withdraw from a course

requirements.text: The user must be able to see their progress
requirements.description: The user must be able to see their progress in bars with percentages

requirements.text: The user must be able to see course's details
requirements.description: The user must be able to see the title, the description, the files, the reviews of a course

requirements.text: The user must be able to filter the search
requirements.description: The user must be able to filter the search. (category, difficulty, cost, duration)
